0132B4FD.Phase53Description: I've found the lone tree. The monk's scroll must be nearby.

0871A46B.Toast: Walk the Zakarum pilgrim path for great rewards.

30DC76D6.Phase10Description: I've found a dead monk's journal along with a note giving cryptic clues to a scroll of great power hidden on the coast of Kotun's Reach. I should search for the first location in the note.

398557AF.Callback9Header: Find the Zakarum Trail Marker in Khotun's Reach

C3B68EF9.Phase13Description: I've found the great wreck listed in the note. Now I need to find the marker on an overlook.

D29F0719.Callback12Header: Find the Zakarum Trail Marker on the overlook

D6E30DFE.Phase27Description: Reading the scroll summoned a demon.  Perhaps this was the demon's way of tricking people into bringing it to Sanctuary.

E96ABF3F.Phase19Description: At the end of the trail sits a strange scroll. It must be the one the monk spoke of.
